title: october 6: the story of the first train robbery in the wild, wild (mid) west
description:
All aboard! This train is leaving the station but not staying on track. In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares the daring tale of the first train robbery! Brothers John and Simeon Reno may not be the first culprits to rob trains, but they sure had their fair share of practice in order to take on the daring task. As for our fun musical fact, Maia tells the story of a famous pop star's debut single not getting much attention, but how it ended up gaining her a ton of exposure. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
